timeline.body:
We could compact the loop with the check a bit. For example: 
```
Arrays.stream(lines).anyMatch(line -> Arrays.stream(pieces).allMatch(line::contains))
```
timeline.bodyText:
We could compact the loop with the check a bit. For example:

replies.bodyText: I considered that but I thought it was harder to read. I guess it's a matter of preference, I can change it
replies.author: MiguelPires

timeline.body: IMO: a full name is easier to read. So `messageWorkflow()` instead of `msgWorkflow()`. But it is more of a personal preference.
